document.full_text: a u.s. appeals court on tuesday backed iran in a dispute with americans who demand that persian antiquities in two chicago museums be used to pay damages for victims of a 1997 suicide bombing in israel.
document.title: u.s. court backs iran in dispute over assets
lines_and_colors: a u.s. appeals court on tuesday backed iran in a dispute with americans who demand that persian antiquities in two chicago museums be used to pay damages for victims of a 1997 suicide bombing in israel.
